org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.ssh

Class SshToolInvocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.invocation.ToolInvocation
      • org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.ssh.SshToolInvocation

  • public class SshToolInvocation
extends ToolInvocation
    The job is executed by connecting to a worker pc using ssh, i.e. not via the grid.
    Author:
    Hajo Krabbenhoeft
